title: PERFORMED MEDICAL VISIT
description: The visit for subject, designates one specific visit instance for a CLINICAL TRIAL SUBJECT or a subject recruited for other study types. It acts as a controlling object to check whether the subject visit has been completed or missed (status), when it has been completed and, if applicable, the delay in the visit's execution for the subject.

studySubjectUniqueSubjectNumber.title: studySubject.uniqueSubjectNumber
studySubjectUniqueSubjectNumber.description:
Unique identifier of the CLINICAL TRIAL SUBJECT enrolled at the associated CLINICAL TRIAL SITE.
The ID builds from the BI Clinical Trial Number, Clinical Trial Site ID together with the Subject Identifier given by the CTMS.

Derivation is coming from Site Number from CLINICAL TRIAL SITE.

actualDate.title: actualDate
actualDate.description: The actual date of the MEDICAL SUBJECT VISIT.

subjectVisitStatus.title: subjectVisitStatus
subjectVisitStatus.description: Names the subject visit status of this MEDICAL SUBJECT VISIT.

plannedDate.title: plannedDate
plannedDate.description:
The date this PERFORMED MEDICAL VISIT was planned to be conducted.
Derived from Study Date in associated PLANNED MEDICAL VISIT (superclass PLANNED MEDICAL ACTIVITY).
